issue.title: [CF 1370] Load Group on certain boss
issue.body:
I would love to be able to have a certain TMW group loaded on Skorpyron (where I use talent X and Y) and another TMW auto loaded on another boss ,where I use talent Z and X). Is this doable?


> Posted by CurseForge user MCFUser117123 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1370 | Raw

comments.body:
Use the DBM or BigWigs conditions.

Edited Jan 29, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
